componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve connector
3. Measure coil resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

componentTest.name: NTC Thermistor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure resistance at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: Should drop to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
6. Verify firm mechanical contact
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling

componentTest.name: Pressure Sensor/Switch
componentTest.expectedVoltage: Sensor: 5V DC supply, 0.5-4.5V signal | Switch: N/A
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Locate pressure component
3. Test sensor: Measure voltage at different pressures
4. Test switch: Check continuity at >1 bar pressure
5. Verify smooth operation
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Sensor voltage changes with pressure; Switch closes >0.8bar | FAIL: Stuck readings; Switch always open/closed
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V AC present; System pressurized; Power OFF before work

componentTest.name: Fan Motor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Check fan spins freely
3. Measure winding resistance: 100-500Ω
4. Power ON, call for heat
5. Measure voltage: 230V AC
6. Fan should start within 5s
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Spins freely; Correct resistance; 230V present; Runs smoothly | FAIL: Seized; OL; No voltage; Doesn't run
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V SHOCK; Spinning blades; May start suddenly; Wear safety glasses

1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure resistance at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: Should drop to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
6. Verify firm mechanical contact
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling

componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling

componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve connector
3. Measure coil resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

componentTest.name: Pressure Sensor/Switch
componentTest.expectedVoltage: Sensor: 5V DC supply, 0.5-4.5V signal | Switch: N/A
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Locate pressure component
3. Test sensor: Measure voltage at different pressures
4. Test switch: Check continuity at >1 bar pressure
5. Verify smooth operation
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Sensor voltage changes with pressure; Switch closes >0.8bar | FAIL: Stuck readings; Switch always open/closed
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V AC present; System pressurized; Power OFF before work

componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve connector
3. Measure coil resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

componentTest.name: NTC Thermistor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure resistance at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: Should drop to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
6. Verify firm mechanical contact
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling

componentTest.expectedVoltage: Sensor: 5V DC supply, 0.5-4.5V signal | Switch: N/A
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Locate pressure component
3. Test sensor: Measure voltage at different pressures
4. Test switch: Check continuity at >1 bar pressure
5. Verify smooth operation
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Sensor voltage changes with pressure; Switch closes >0.8bar | FAIL: Stuck readings; Switch always open/closed
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V AC present; System pressurized; Power OFF before work

L6.description: False flame detection / Flame before gas on

componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve connector
3. Measure coil resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

diagnosticSteps: replace air pressure switch if faulty

componentTest.name: NTC Thermistor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure resistance at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: Should drop to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
6. Verify firm mechanical contact
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling

componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V SHOCK; System HOT & PRESSURIZED; Isolate power; Water spillage risk

componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve connector
3. Measure coil resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

6. Valve should click audibly

componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve connector
3. Measure coil resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V SHOCK; Spinning blades; May start suddenly; Wear safety glasses

componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve connector
3. Measure coil resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

60.description: Fan fault / Fan speed out of range

componentTest.name: Fan Motor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Check fan spins freely
3. Measure winding resistance: 100-500Ω
4. Power ON, call for heat
5. Measure voltage: 230V AC
6. Fan should start within 5s
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Spins freely; Correct resistance; 230V present; Runs smoothly | FAIL: Seized; OL; No voltage; Doesn't run
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V SHOCK; Spinning blades; May start suddenly; Wear safety glasses

componentTest.name: Pressure Sensor/Switch
componentTest.expectedVoltage: Sensor: 5V DC supply, 0.5-4.5V signal | Switch: N/A
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Locate pressure component
3. Test sensor: Measure voltage at different pressures
4. Test switch: Check continuity at >1 bar pressure
5. Verify smooth operation
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Sensor voltage changes with pressure; Switch closes >0.8bar | FAIL: Stuck readings; Switch always open/closed
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V AC present; System pressurized; Power OFF before work

1. POWER OFF
2. Locate pressure component
3. Test sensor: Measure voltage at different pressures
4. Test switch: Check continuity at >1 bar pressure
5. Verify smooth operation
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Sensor voltage changes with pressure; Switch closes >0.8bar | FAIL: Stuck readings; Switch always open/closed
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V AC present; System pressurized; Power OFF before work

componentTest.name: NTC Thermistor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure resistance at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: Should drop to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
6. Verify firm mechanical contact
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling

componentTest.name: Gas Valve
componentTest.equipment: Digital multimeter (AC Volts & Ohms); Insulated probes
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF, gas OFF
2. Disconnect valve connector
3. Measure coil resistance: 2.8-4.5kΩ
4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

60.description: Fan fault / Fan speed out of range

componentTest.name: Fan Motor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Check fan spins freely
3. Measure winding resistance: 100-500Ω
4. Power ON, call for heat
5. Measure voltage: 230V AC
6. Fan should start within 5s
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Spins freely; Correct resistance; 230V present; Runs smoothly | FAIL: Seized; OL; No voltage; Doesn't run
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V SHOCK; Spinning blades; May start suddenly; Wear safety glasses

5. Check vibration/circulation

componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V SHOCK; System HOT & PRESSURIZED; Isolate power; Water spillage risk

1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure resistance at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: Should drop to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
6. Verify firm mechanical contact
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling

2. Disconnect thermistor

4. Reconnect, power ON
5. Measure voltage when heating: 230V AC
6. Valve should click audibly
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Correct resistance; 230V present; Audible click | FAIL: OL/short; No voltage; Voltage but no click
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ GAS SAFE ONLY; 230V SHOCK HAZARD; Gas leak risk; Turn OFF gas before work

componentTest.name: NTC Thermistor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure resistance at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: Should drop to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
6. Verify firm mechanical contact
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling

componentTest.name: Pressure Sensor/Switch
componentTest.expectedVoltage: Sensor: 5V DC supply, 0.5-4.5V signal | Switch: N/A

2. Locate pressure component
3. Test sensor: Measure voltage at different pressures
4. Test switch: Check continuity at >1 bar pressure
5. Verify smooth operation
componentTest.passFail: PASS: Sensor voltage changes with pressure; Switch closes >0.8bar | FAIL: Stuck readings; Switch always open/closed
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ 230V AC present; System pressurized; Power OFF before work

componentTest.name: NTC Thermistor
componentTest.procedure:
1. POWER OFF
2. Disconnect thermistor
3. Measure resistance at room temp: ~10kΩ
4. Warm with hand: Should drop to 7-8kΩ
5. Check cable continuity
6. Verify firm mechanical contact
componentTest.passFail: PASS: 9.7-10.3kΩ @ 25°C; Drops when warmed | FAIL: OL/short; Doesn't change; Erratic
componentTest.safety: ⚠️ Power OFF; System may be HOT; Ensure firm contact when reinstalling
